name: mens-kart-cordova
description: Mens Kart - Cordova/PhoneGap APK Build Configuration

scripts.setup: npm install -g cordova && cordova create mens-kart-cordova com.menskart.app 'Mens Kart'
scripts.prepare: cp -r frontend/* mens-kart-cordova/www/ && cp config.xml mens-kart-cordova/
scripts.add-platform: cd mens-kart-cordova && cordova platform add android
scripts.add-plugins: cd mens-kart-cordova && cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-whitelist cordova-plugin-splashscreen cordova-plugin-statusbar cordova-plugin-network-information

author: Mens Kart Team
